name: ARKANOID INVADERS
description:
This game is a mix of Arkanoid and Space Invaders.

Just like in Arkanoid you move your paddle, but instead of hitting bricks, you hit Invaders to pass levels and just like in Space Invaders you lose life, when Invaders reach the bottom of the board and when you are hit by a projectile(the ball can destroy them), but also just like in Arkanoid you lose life, when the ball falls outside the board.

After each level you pass, the game speeds up and every 5 levels the number of enemies increases and you also get extra lives.

When the number of lives drops to 0, you lose.

There are 2 game modes available in the game:

- Classic - without bonuses

- Arcade - with bonuses

Bonuses include: extra lives, changing the size of the paddle and ball speed, extra points, protection from projectiles, etc.

Controls: -WASD or Arrows - move

-F1 - Fullscreen (only in desktop version)

-Esc - Return to menu

-Space or Enter - select

Note: There are gaps between the opponents, so don't be surprised if the ball flies between them, or knocks a few of them down while flying through the gap.

If you are interested, the sounds(including the music) come from freesounds.org .

If you find any bugs, let me know about them.

Good luck :)
